review.description: I love the flowers, but the customer service could be better.  They offer a set of flowers that are $5 each or three for $12.  The lilies are $6 ea or three for $15.   I am at their market stand every week.  I asked if I could do two of the $5 group and one lily and give them the extra dollar to make it $13.  He said absolutely not.  I would have to pay $16.   Really?   I wasn't asking him to give me the lily for $5, I would pay the extra dollar but get the benefit of the deal when you buy three.  I think he wasn't quite listening at first and when he understood he didn't want to look like he was giving in.  Rubbed the wrong way at the farmer's market today.
review.author: Nora O.
